description:
Irie forced the blocks in Merone Base to move in order to find Tsuna. Because of that, Spanner`s computer malfunctions and Tsuna is trapped in a virtual simulator gone out of control. The Ultimate Robot program that Irie made in high school appears before him. In this dangerous situation, Tsuna must attack and not run away! Meanwhile, Yamamoto happens to run into Nosaru, who is confused by the reorganization of the blocks. Nosaru is bitter about losing to Yamamoto from the future and immediately goes into battle position--!
Source: crunchyroll
